claims.claim: Partnerships between educational services and community outreach programs enhance youth access to resources.
claims.quote: So, the program we're hosting right now is partnership between L G D Educational Services, urban Community Outreach, grow, Detroit Young Talent. The Youth Connection, Pingry Farms and Milton manufacturer grow Detroit Young Grow Detroit.

claims.claim: Agricultural and animal care programs provide unique learning opportunities for urban youth.
claims.quote: So students are paid by those organizations and they're, for six weeks, they go to different work sites to work. So Pingry Farms and Milton Manufacturing agreed to host the students here. So the students come, they have garden duties, barn duties. We have a viticulture program that's hosted by Michigan State so students can come and learn how to grow grapes and develop grapes into jelly and things like that.

claims.claim: Hands-on training in specialized manufacturing skills offers significant career benefits without a college degree.
claims.quote: So ultimately it's these students can go in and develop an engineering skill that'll pay them six figures for the rest of their life without ever going to college.

claims.claim: Exposure to agriculture and animal care fosters unique interests and skills among urban youth.
claims.quote: It's these opportunities that I'm watching for him, and it's exciting to see young people doing things that they normally wouldn't do.

claims.claim: Youth engagement in productive activities reduces excessive reliance on technology for social interaction.
claims.quote: Most of these young people would be, if I spin the phone around right now, There's eight of 'em in here. You wouldn't know it was eight of 'em in here. They all on their phone. [...] when they come here for these five hours, it's five hours of me barking at 'em. Get off your phone, come on, get out here in this garden.

claims.claim: Community programs enable the formation of new social bonds and mutual interests among youth.
claims.quote: And so now through our program and through this opportunity, you can see bonds forming. You can see you've taken ownership like. Each one is taking ownership in something else they like.

claims.claim: Creating immersive learning environments is key to educational enrichment for urban youth.
claims.quote: I've been executive director at Pingry Farms for a year now. July 1st, I stepped in and my focus was to increase the education. So ideally I wanted. To be able to create a space of enrichment.
